text: whyn ja'ahum alqran min eind allah musadiqana lima maeahum min altawrat jhdwh, wankru nbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wakanuu qabl bethth ystnsrwn bih ealaa mshrky alerb, wyqwlwn: qarub mabeath nby akhr alzman, wsntbeh wnqatlkm meh. flmma ja'ahum alrasul aldhy earafuu sfatih wsidqah kafaruu bih wkdhbwh. flent allah ealaa kl man kafar bnby allah warasulah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wktabh aldhy awhah allah 'ilyh
